source_sentence: 唵嚩日羅播儞吽鈴真言曰。

source_sentence: 唵嚩日羅健吒覩使也斛次奉獻閼伽印明(如常)　次虛空藏四方結(如常)　次金剛牆(如常)　次灑淨真言(如常)五大虛空藏儀軌於仁和寺皆明寺。
translation: "Om vajra gandha tuhya dubu Next, he offered his name as a sign (as usual), next he offered the four sides of the Ākāśagarbha (as usual), next he offered the four sides of the Vajradhātu (as usual), next he offered the true words of purification (as usual), and the five rituals of the Ākāśagarbha were written down at Renhe Temple and Kaiming Temple.

source_sentence: 以拇尾山法鼓臺本書寫畢　于時天明二壬寅年秋八月四日夜。
